channel.title: What motivates you to play?
channel.description:
So mopar,
What motivates you to actually play RuneScape legit? I use to bot for years and had a lot of success anyway I still enjoy the RuneScape side of things I just don't ever seem to have the motivation to play legit..I do enjoy doing certain skills and minigames and ect legit but at times I just don't get any motivation to play legit even though I really would like to.

item.title: What motivates you to play?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Wet Dreamss:

I enjoy spending my time masturbating all day instead of playing rs. way more enjoyable

Didn’t I tell you to stop masturbating?

I play RS when I have little to do, mainly for questing and levelling for quest.

Read full topic

item.title: What motivates you to play?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

marcbob:

Pking is the only thing that is still fun to me on runescape and most of the time I just go on servers to pk.

PKing sucks on RS nowadays too…
Goes like this every time:
1.Hop on W18
2.Find a fight
3.Start fighting
4. Get PJed by clawer->Fail
5. Get PJed by another 5 clawers->Fail
6.Teleport and log out, cancel membership.

Read full topic

item.title: What motivates you to play?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

Nothing, I try to play Runescape and I can force myself to play for about 30 mins before I ask “What else is there to do?”

item.title: What motivates you to play?
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“waj, post:21, topic:441418”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=544114.msg3988840#msg3988840 date=1336287899]
If you need motivation to play a game I’m pretty sure you’re doing it wrong. Games should be something you do for fun, not something you need to force yourself to do. If you find botting fun, so be it, but if you can’t having fun playing legit, don’t.
[/quote]
What you say is some what true, but once you’ve known and done the same thing for so many years(botting) it just becomes a part of everyday life and I do like to play legit in some sense and skills. Some of the stuff is just boring as I don’t understand the full concept of RuneScape these days and have not kept up with the new updates what are always rolling out.

And as I stated I have no P2P and I’ve not really played since Dungeoneering was out, so I basically have no idea what the skill is for and if it can benefit you in anyway or how to start it, level it and ect.

Oh and for the friends bit, I only actually know one person who plays RuneScape these days so doing stuff with friends is really hard.[/quote]
In addition, you might need to train for the fun stuff on RS, like PKing, quests etc. And training is really boring…

Read full topic

item.title: What motivates you to play?
item.dc:creator: @waj waj
item.description:
@waj wrote:

Davidi2:

If you need motivation to play a game I’m pretty sure you’re doing it wrong. Games should be something you do for fun, not something you need to force yourself to do. If you find botting fun, so be it, but if you can’t having fun playing legit, don’t.

What you say is some what true, but once you’ve known and done the same thing for so many years(botting) it just becomes a part of everyday life and I do like to play legit in some sense and skills. Some of the stuff is just boring as I don’t understand the full concept of RuneScape these days and have not kept up with the new updates what are always rolling out.

And as I stated I have no P2P and I’ve not really played since Dungeoneering was out, so I basically have no idea what the skill is for and if it can benefit you in anyway or how to start it, level it and ect.

Oh and for the friends bit, I only actually know one person who plays RuneScape these days so doing stuff with friends is really hard.

Read full topic

@davidi2 wrote:

If you need motivation to play a game I’m pretty sure you’re doing it wrong. Games should be something you do for fun, not something you need to force yourself to do. If you find botting fun, so be it, but if you can’t having fun playing legit, don’t.

Read full topic
